snippet.title: Lovecraft's Mythos Run - F2P Endless Runner for Android and iOS based on Lovecraft's Untold Stories
snippet.description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.blinigames.MythosRun

LLC Blini Games have developed Lovecraft’s Untold Stories Mythos Run, an entertaining endless runner for mobile platforms (Android and iOS), based on their original and successful roguelike multiplatform game, Lovecraft’s Untold Stories, released in 2019 for PC, console and mobile platforms.
By using the same graphics, style and lore, this game will attract lovers of the Endless runners, fans of Lovecraft’s novels, and of course, the faithful community of the original game, looking for having more fun playing their beloved franchise.
The main heroes run to escape from a huge flying polyp, that chases them. If it catches the heroes, it is game over. The goal is to get as far as possible. Enemies will approach the heroes to kill or stop them. The heroes can shoot the enemies to kill them. Enemies killed drop money and other items that the heroes can pick up. Money can be used to buy new items at the game shop.
Game can end in two ways:
a) The big monster reaches the main heroes.
b) The main heroes’ health reaches zero. The main heroes have 3 hitpoints. Each time an enemy hits them, they lose 1 hitpoint.
Basic features:
1) The graphics, animations, music and sounds of the original game Lovecraft’s Untold Stories
2) Unlockable heroes: Control the well-known heroes of the original title: Detective, Professor and Witch.
3) 3 different bosses with special attack mechanics: Giant Spider, Night Hunter and Nyarlathotep’s Avatar.
4) Dozens of different enemies that will attack the heroes from both sides.
5) Shoot left and right, and dodge the traps and attacks to survive as long as possible.
6) Different settings: Mansion, Laboratory, Cemetery and Caves.
7) Buy items at the shop and equip them on your hero to increase your chances to survive.
8) Make the perfect build. Your hero can only wear 5 items at the same time so choose carefully and make your hero unkillable.

Music: https://www.bensound.com
